body: At 20th level, your verdant heritage fully manifests. You gain a +4 natural armor bonus. You gain immunity to paralysis, poison, polymorph, sleep, and stunning, and you gain tremorsense 30 feet even when not rooted.
name: Shepherd of the Trees
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Sorcerer/Bloodlines/Verdant/Bloodline Powers/Shepherd of the Trees
